DefectReportPDF.polygon¶

DefectReportPDF.polygon(point_list, fill=False)¶

Outputs a polygon defined by three or more points.

Parameters

  • point_list (list of tuples) – List of Abscissa and Ordinate of polygon that should be drawn

  • fill (bool) – If true polygon will be filled

Next topic
